location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], and his assistants, William Bowyear and John Sebastian Natter, to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter reports that Carem Khaun [Karim Khan] wants to purchase more woollens for his army but wants the price lowered, which the author refuses to do. Also given is the news that a Dutch ship has arrived to take their countrymen, and a pilot boat has been taken by Meer Mahanna's [MÄ«r Muhanna] men.
